backend/main.mo: Main actor defining user profiles, client data models, authorization checks, and related helpers for progress, subscriptions, follow‑ups, and onboarding.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old client records to the new format by adding owner and initialPlanDetails fields.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing added or updated frontend files related to plan subscriptions and UI updates for onboarding and client views.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and updates of various frontend files across the app.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS variables and theme definitions for light and dark modes with OKLCH color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template loading the app root and SheetJS for Excel export.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component managing authentication, actor connection, profile setup, routing, and lazy-loaded pages.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginGate.t: Login screen providing Internet Identity authentication with styled UI and feature highlights.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: A form dialog for entering and saving a user's name during profile setup, with validation and loading states.
frontend/src/components/clients/ActionHi: Displays a tooltip message with an optional icon for contextual hints.
frontend/src/components/clients/Activate: Dialog for selecting a client's plan start date and follow‑up day before activation, with validation handling.
frontend/src/components/clients/ClientPr: Shows primary client management actions such as activate, pause, resume, renew, expire, and convert to full onboarding.
frontend/src/components/clients/ClientsS: Dropdown button for filtering clients by status, showing counts and the currently selected filter.
frontend/src/components/clients/ClientSt: Renders a badge representing a client’s current status including onboarding, active, paused, and expired states.
frontend/src/components/clients/ConvertT: Button to convert a client to full onboarding, with loading, disabled, and hint states.
frontend/src/components/clients/ExportCl: Dialog for exporting client data to Excel, supporting full or custom field selection with validation.
frontend/src/components/clients/FollowUp: Dialog for marking follow-ups done or not, validating notes in manual mode, and submitting the result with optional loading state.
Displays follow-up status, history, and a button to manually mark a follow-up as done, using client data and utility formatters.
frontend/src/components/clients/PauseCli: Dialog that validates and submits pause duration and reason for pausing a client's plan, resetting state on close.
frontend/src/components/clients/RenewSub: Dialog for renewing a subscription by selecting months, extra days, and a start date, validating inputs before confirming.
frontend/src/components/clients/Subscrip: Renders a table of client subscriptions with status badges, sorted by start date, showing duration and active state.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Active: Wraps ClientsMetricDialog to display active clients with predefined title, description, and settings.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Client: Dialog component that lists client metrics with export and view actions, supporting optional columns based on props.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Expiri: Wrapper around ClientsMetricDialog configured to show clients with plans expiring within 10 days.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Onboar: Dialog showing half and full onboarding clients with actions to view, export, and convert to full onboarding.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Paused: Wrapper around ClientsMetricDialog for displaying clients who have paused their training.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Renewa: Dialog listing clients with plans expiring this month, including export and view functionality.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/TotalC: Wrapper around ClientsMetricDialog that displays all active clients.
frontend/src/components/debug/InitialLoa: Debug panel showing initial load timing events with live updates and visibility toggle.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main app layout with navigation, user menu, theming options, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/RouteLoad: Simple loading fallback component for route transitions.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/Onboa: Static help component explaining onboarding states and activation requirements.
Multi-step onboarding wizard UI with step indicators, scrollable content, and next/back/submit controls.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/PlanS: Form section for entering plan duration, unit, and extra days with validation and helper text.
frontend/src/components/progress/Progres: Displays weight and measurement history using Recharts line charts, with sorted data and formatted dates.
Form for submitting new progress measurements, performing validation, mutation, and resetting fields on success.
Renders a sortable progress history table with trends and formatted values for each measurement.
frontend/src/components/theme/ThemeToggl: Dropdown menu items for switching between light, dark, and system themes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the backend actor based on identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorReady.ts: Hook wrapping useActor to provide a delayed ready signal for safer query mounting during actor transitions.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendReadiness.t: Polls backend readiness with exponential backoff, resetting state when the actor changes and exposing isChecking and isReady flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handling AuthClient creation, login, logout, and identity persistence with status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines react-query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data, scoped by identity and gated on backend readiness.
frontend/src/hooks/useRouter.ts: Implements hash-based routing with helpers for navigation and extracting a client code.
frontend/src/hooks/useStableActorConnect: Wraps backend readiness into a stabilized connection state with brief delay to avoid UI flicker.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark themes, color tokens, and typography.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/ClientProfilePage.tsx: Client profile page showing client details, progress, actions, dialogs, and subscription management driven by query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/ClientsListPage.tsx: Displays a searchable and filterable list of clients, including status filtering and an export-to-Excel dialog.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Computes and displays client metrics with dialogs for detailed lists of totals, onboarding, paused, expiring, and renewal opportunities.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardClientPage.tsx: Implements a multi-step wizard for creating a new client with validation, plan details, onboarding state, and final submission.
frontend/src/utils/clientCode.ts: Provides helpers to format client codes and match them against normalized search queries.
frontend/src/utils/clientExportFields.ts: Defines exportable client fields with accessors for Excel generation, including plan, status, and subscription metadata.
frontend/src/utils/errors.ts: Normalizes backend errors into concise, user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/excelExport.ts: Builds and downloads an Excel file from client data using SheetJS with auto-sized columns.
frontend/src/utils/followUp.ts: Calculates follow-up due status, latest entries, and date matching logic for client follow-up tracking.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Provides helpers to format bigint timestamps into date, datetime, and Excel-friendly strings.
frontend/src/utils/initialLoadTimings.ts: Implements a debug-gated timing utility to record, end, and report initial load performance events.
frontend/src/utils/mobileNumber.ts: Offers functions to normalize, validate, and return error messages for mobile numbers.
frontend/src/utils/plan.ts: Calculates total plan days, computes plan end dates, and formats dates for input fields.
Determines current-month boundaries and filters or counts clients with subscription end dates within the month.
frontend/src/utils/status.ts: Defines client status logic, including activation, expiration, display status, and computes summary metrics.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles URL parameter extraction, session persistence, and cleanup for query and hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme settings, colors, animations, and loading plugins.
project_state.json: Describes project state, issues, and feature requests related to onboarding plan details and user data isolation.
